trans-unit.source: Usergroup: Define a usergroup which is allowed to create a new club in Frontend.
PID for poiCollections: Define a storage pid where to store records of type Point of Interest.
UID of root Category: In each club record you have the possibility to add one or more categories. In huge installations it's better to define a root category UID here to NOT show all categories.
email from address: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
email from name: The senders email name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
email to address: The recipients email address.
email to name: The recipients email name.
